about.title: Get to Know US
about.slogan: make all{br}vector football club logos{br}accessible to you
about.content:
We started Worldvectorlogo because we as designers want to empower designers across the globe.

Our mission is to make all logos in the world accessible to you.

This is a huge challenge, and we are constantly improving our service to make that happen.

We are not alone in this.

We always like to receive your feedback and new ideas.

Feel free reaching out to us: info@worldvectorlogo.com.
